page.title: 12EVENTS
page.content: Following the change of the name of the estate, representations were made to the Governors of Boycott Farm First School to consider changing the name of the school. The Governors felt that the parents of the school ought to have an opportunity to express their views so a poll was conducted and the result was a clear 2:1 expression in favour of change. The Governors decided to recommend to the Local Education Authority that the name of the school be changed to Westlands First School. This recommendation was accepted by the Authority and the change is to come into effect from 1st September, 1985.
